text: National anarchism is a form of Anarchism that developed in the 90s that wishes to make humanity live in small tribes made up of people who belong to the same race as each other. ==Books== *Sanchez, Casey (Summer 2009). "'National Anarchism': California racists claim they're Anarchists". Intelligence Report. *Sunshine, Spencer (Winter 2008). "Rebranding Fascism: National-Anarchists". The Public Eye. 23 (4): 1â€“12.
